# WELCOME TO BUSBY & FOX, WHERE EVERYTHING GOES WITH EVERYTHING ELSE.  
  
OUR COLOURS, SHAPES AND FABRICS ARE DESIGNED TO BLEND PERFECTLY TOGETHER, WHILE OUR CLEVER CUTS AND DETAILS COMPLEMENT YOUR BODY FOR THE ULTIMATE CONFIDENCE.  
  
  

## THE BESTSELLING DINA CARDIGAN RETURNS

Our popular Dina cardigan is back in a beautifully soft blush pink, ready to accompany you through spring. Let's take a closer look at why our customers love this chunky knit cardigan and how you can blend it into your capsule wardrobe.

[READ MORE](/blogs/inspiration/the-bestselling-dina-cardigan-returns-in-blush)

"I want every woman to know the beauty of dressing in a way that makes her feel comfortable and confident."

### founder, emma vowles

### YOUR effortless wardrobe

## CURRENT CAPSULE

Discover our latest edit of effortless pieces designed to work together, blending with past, present and future styles, so you can create a great look day after day, season after season, without even trying.

[SHOP THE COLLECTION](/collections/current-capsule)

"Excellent online service. Speedy delivery, beautifully packaged, high-quality and well-made clothing."

_Kath H._

"The clothes are stylish yet comfortable... they make me feel and look my best, giving me the confidence I need. Any woman wearing Busby & Fox can't help but feel good about their day!"

_Marion P._

"Prompt delivery and great quality... I was delighted with my first buy from Busby & Fox"

_Jennifer F._

"Such gorgeous, unique, relaxed styles which, though I say it myself, look amazing on my mature figure and make me feel so good! Keep on doing what you do, Busby & Fox."

_Sally R._

"I discovered your shop last year and fell in love with everything about it - the colours, the style, the atmosphere. You gave me the motivation to change my wardrobe from boring to exciting. Thank you."  
  
_Renata I._

"I love that the founder shares her thoughts and styling tips so it's not just clothes, it's a style solution."

_Emma W._

 

### pop into our stores

Our stores are the heart of Busby & Fox, where you can explore your style and always find something that feels so perfectly 'you'. Our experienced store teams are always on hand with tips and tricks to inspire and support you with style advice, and the kettle's always on to make you feel even more at home.

[FIND YOUR STORE](/pages/our-stores)

## INSPIRATION AWAITS

Sign up to our newsletter for styling tips, exclusive offers, in-store events and more...

  Subscribe

## Made by EOU

Edge of Urge began with one goal in mind: making quality products and acting as a launch pad for like-minded creators and artists. All these years later this still holds true and we are proud to continue to make some of those original products to this day.
